rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg001
rows.name: Seems like a good place to rest.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg002
rows.name:
Hey, Hikari...
May I ask you something?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg003
rows.name:
Huh?
Something up?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg004
rows.name:
I read over my journal again.
We used to fight each other quite a lot
during training, didn't we?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg005
rows.name:
And...it looks like I usually came off
worse...

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg006
rows.name:
Don't take it too hard. You really gave
it all you had. But I guess I've just got
certain attributes...

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg007
rows.name: Sorry, what did you want to ask?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg008
rows.name:
Well, according to my journal...
it looks like there was one time
where I got the better of you.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg009
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg010
rows.name:
It doesn't go into much detail...
But still, besting the Holy Grail is quite
the achievement, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg011
rows.name:
I really need to know how it happened,
how I managed to beat you.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg012
rows.name: That's bull.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg013
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg014
rows.name:
Your journal is lying to you, Kagutsuchi!
I never lost to you, not once!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg015
rows.name:
I don't think so! Why else would
I have written it down?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg016
rows.name:
When, exactly?
What kind of match was it?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg017
rows.name:
It was in a camp in the Iiran
borderlands, on the last day of
training.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg018
rows.name:
That doesn't sound right at all!
It's nonsense!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg021
rows.name: How should I protest?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg019
rows.name: You're saying my journal is mistaken?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg020
rows.name: Are you calling me a liar?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg101
rows.name: I meant...that fight didn't count!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg102
rows.name: Didn't count? Explain.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg103
rows.name:
That fight was right after I'd gone up
against Kasumi. You begged me to take
you on!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg104
rows.name: So that's why it doesn't count!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg105
rows.name:
I see.
You just don't want to acknowledge
your defeat.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg106
rows.name: I told you, you didn't beat me!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg107
rows.name: This is really childish, Hikari.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg108
rows.name:
It seems that you only won narrowly in
most of our other bouts. I don't know
how you can be so stubborn!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg109
rows.name:
Hmmm. Are you sure your journal
isn't just a load of fantasy trash-talk
written down?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg110
rows.name:
Hikari. You want a piece
of me? Come get it!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg111
rows.name:
Ladies, please! Making a mountain
out of a molehill here, aren't we?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg112
rows.name: There's no need to brawl!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg113
rows.name: We're not brawling.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg114
rows.name:
That's right.
We're just training.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg115
rows.name:
Okay! Ready yourself!
After so many years, let me set you
straight!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg116
rows.name:
I'll make it clear this time.
You'll know I'm the better fighter once
and for all!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg117
rows.name:
Now, hold on! Not so fast!
Will someone please intervene...?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg201
rows.name: The truth hurts, Kagutsuchi.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg202
rows.name:
You purposefully waited for a time
when I was tired out for that fight.
That's a cowardly tactic.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg203
rows.name:
Shut it! We were pretty evenly
matched, my journal said!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg204
rows.name:
We're almost level in terms of ability!
There's nothing strange about me
winning once in a while!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg205
rows.name:
Hang on...
Why were you recording stuff like that
in so much detail anyway?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg206
rows.name:
Let me get a look at that journal!
I bet it needs a few corrections!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg207
rows.name:
Cut that out! Don't you dare try
to taint the truth!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg208
rows.name: Ah...Erm...

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg209
rows.name: What?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg210
rows.name: Speak up!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg211
rows.name:
Do you really thinks it's wise to quarrel
like this?

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg212
rows.name:
This is not a quarrel, Byakko.
Withdraw, if you want to retain your
whiskers.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg213
rows.name:
That's right.
This is just a friendly bit of rivalry.
So keep your nose out of it!

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg215
rows.name:
Kagutsuchi.
You will know my power today.
For real.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg216
rows.name:
Hikari...
You're going to eat those words.

rows.label: kizunatalk026_msg217
rows.name:
Well now...
You two certainly have a strange
concept of friendship.
